meanings.sent1: We rediscussed the plan to make sure everyone understood.
meanings.sent2: After the meeting, they rediscussed the important points.
meanings.sent3: The group rediscussed the movie, but still couldn't agree on the best scene.
meanings.sent4: Their conversation rediscussed the topic like a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rediscussed the lesson with the confused student until it finally made sense.

meanings.definition: To talk about something previously discussed
meanings.sent1: She rediscussed the party details with her friend to confirm everything.
meanings.sent2: The team rediscussed the game strategy before the match.
meanings.sent3: The siblings rediscussed their family vacation plans over dinner.
meanings.sent4: Their argument rediscussed the same points over and over.
meanings.sent5: He rediscussed the project timeline with his manager to ensure clarity.
